Source   Edit  

This module implements the Nazo Puyo Grimoire.

Imports

simulator, ../core, ../private/algorithm, ../private/arrayutils, ../private/assign, ../private/setutils, ../private/suffixarray, ../private/tables, ../private/app/grimoire

Types

Grimoire = object
  simulator*: Simulator
Nazo Puyo Grimoire. Source   Edit   
GrimoireEntry = object
  id*: int16                 ## `id` should be unique and non-negative
  query*: string
  rule*: Rule
  moveCount*: int
  goal*: Goal
  title*: string
  creators*: seq[string]
  source*: string
  sourceDetail*: string
Entry of the Nazo Puyo Grimoire. Source   Edit

  kindOptOpt*: Opt[Opt[GoalKind]]
  hasClearColorOpt*: Opt[bool]
  titleOpt*: Opt[string]
  creatorOpt*: Opt[string]
  sourceOpt*: Opt[string]
